function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of autonomous robots in the interconnected IoMT infrastructure may lead to bias and breach of privacy in collecting samples from infected patients.","Impact":"Potential breach of patient privacy and biased sample collection could lead to inaccurate diagnosis and treatment.","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy protocols and unbiased sampling procedures, and provide transparency in the data collection process.","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, and AI algorithms for unbiased sample collection.","People":"Infected patients, individuals in the vicinity of sample collection.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Heterogeneous network protocols and smart applications in remote consultation could lead to privacy and security vulnerabilities.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to patient data and potential privacy breaches during remote consultations.","Mitigation":"Implement robust encryption, secure network protocols, and privacy-preserving technologies for remote consultations.","Technologies":"End-to-end encryption, secure communication protocols, and privacy-preserving algorithms.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and remote consultation service providers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies."},{"Description":"Lack of clear WHO regulations and policies on the use of autonomous and unmanned IoMT concepts in fighting COVID-19.","Impact":"Unclear guidelines may lead to regulatory and ethical concerns regarding the deployment of autonomous IoMT solutions.","Mitigation":"Advocate for the development of clear guidelines and regulations for the use of autonomous IoMT in public health emergencies, and establish ethical frameworks for deployment.","Technologies":"Policy development, ethical AI frameworks, and regulatory compliance tools.","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, and regulatory agencies.","Owner":"Global health organizations, governmental bodies."}]}
